    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"

>
[Dragon Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2420) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 51 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Beast Trainer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1283)

</column>

---

Your hold has a unique draconic connection. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when you attempt to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on a creature with the [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50) trait. You gain access to the [Riding Drake](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=21) animal companion.
